title: Trump proposal to create 'crypto strategic reserve' vexes some industry supporters
summary: Trump announced a US Crypto Strategic Reserve, committing the government to stockpile Bitcoin, Ether, XRP, Solana, and Cardano – boosting the value of his crypto holdings
